kick_not_allowed: <:redTick:751916874522034239> Either you or I lack correct permissions to ban ``{user}``
mute_not_allowed: <:redTick:751916874522034239> Either you or I lack correct permissions to mute ``{user}``
warn_not_allowed: <:redTick:751916874522034239> Either you or I lack correct permissions to warn ``{user}``
warnclearing_not_allowed: <:redTick:751916874522034239> Either you or I lack correct permissions to clear the warnings for ``{user}``
is_system_user: <:redTick:751916874522034239> You can't ban system users or webhooks.
case_not_on_this_server: <:redTick:751916874522034239> I can't find an infraction with the case ID {case} on this server.
case_already_owned: 🤔 Seems like you are already responsible for this infraction.
no_custom_commands: This server doesn't have any custom commands yet.
no_trigger: 🤔 You want to create a command without a trigger? I don't think that makes much sense.
no_reply: 🤔 You want to create a commands without a reply? If you want to delete a command you should use remove
trigger_too_long: Sorry, but custom command triggers can only have up to 15 chars
command_already_exists: A command with that trigger already exists. If you want to the reply, you have the delete the command and add it again.
command_does_not_exist: Hmm, I can't find a command with that name. Maybe you made a little typo.
current_prefix: The current prefix for this server is ``{prefix}``
default_role_forbidden: <:redTick:751916874522034239> You can't use the default role as the mute role.
mute_missing_perm: :redTick:751916874522034239> Hey, I don't have the ``manage roles`` permission on this server. Make sure I have this if you want to use this feature!
role_too_high: I can't assign roles to users that are above my highest role.
no_valid_module: <:redTick:751916874522034239> These don't seem to be valid modules.
enabled_module_channel: <:greenTick:751915988143833118> Enabled the module ``{module}`` and will log actions to {channel}!
not_existing_ignored_user: <:redTick:751916874522034239> ``{user}`` is not on the ignored users list.
ignored_user_removed: <:greenTick:751915988143833118> Removed ``{user}`` from the ignored users list
black_list_disabled: <:redTick:751916874522034239> The ``automod`` module is disabled for this guild, therefore a black list can't be displayed. To enable it, run {prefix}configure add automod
black_list_empty: <:redTick:751916874522034239> The black list for this guild is empty. You can add something by running {prefix}configure black_list add <word>
already_on_black_list: <:redTick:751916874522034239> ``{word}`` is already on the censor list
not_on_black_list: <:redTick:751916874522034239> ``{word}`` is not on the censor list.
no_mute_role: <:redTick:751916874522034239> This server doesn't have a mute role setup yet. Do so by running {prefix}configure mute_role <role>
lvlsystem_disabled: <:redTick:751916874522034239> The rank system is disabled here.
number_too_small: Number too small, must be at least {min}
number_too_big: Number too big, must be at most {max}
unknown_message: I couldn't find that message. It has either been deleted or it's in a channel that I can't access.
log_message_deletion:
``[{on_time} UTC]`` 🗑️ **{user}** (``{user_id}``)'s message in {channel} has been manually deleted. 
```
{content}
```
log_message_edit:
``[{on_time} UTC]`` ✏️ **{user}** (``{user_id}``)'s message in {channel} has been edited. 
Before: 
```
{before}
``` After: 
```
{after}
```
log_leave: ``[{on_time} UTC]`` 📥 **{user}** (`{user_id}`) has left the server (joined {joined} days ago)
about_help: Shows some information about the bot
ping_help: Shows the client latency and the REST API ping
help_help: Shows a full list of commands
commands_help: List of all custom commands. View the subcommands for more info
config_help: Base command for bot configuration. View the subcommands for more info
configuration_log_help: Base command for enabling/disabling log modules, by typing a module name after one of the subcommands
ignored_users_help: Base command for excluding users from the message delete/edit logs
configuration_add_help: Activates a module. Some require a channel paramater for its logging process
jumbo_help: Shows a bigger version an emoji
userinfo_help: View some stats about the user
avatar_help: Sends out a bigger version of the users avatar
cleanup_help: Deletes the bots (and possible invokation) messages from the channel
welcome_channel_help: Sets a channel for welcome messages
create_help: Creates a command with the given trigger & reply
black_list_help: Shows the censor list. Subcommands are add & remove
action_log_help: Sets a log channel for mod actions
ban_help: Bans a user from the server
kick_help: Kicks a user from the server
cleanban_help: Clean bans a user (Ban, delete messages & unban)
forceban_help: Force bans a user (bans them even if they are not in the server anymore)
unban_help: Unbans a user from the server
mute_help: Mutes a user (mute role needs to be configured)
mban_help: Bans multiple users for the same reason (targets should be defined by their user IDs)
mkick_help: Kicks multiple users for the same reason (targets should be defined by their user IDs)
massban_help: A more advanced ban command with multiple argument options
purge_help: Purges up to 200 messages in a channel
clean_help: Base command for message cleaning. View the subcommands for more info.
clean_until_help: Clean message up to the given one
clean_last_help: Clean the messages sent during the the given duration
clean_user_help: Cleans the given amount of messages. Passing in multiple users is possible
clean_bots_help: Cleans the given amount of messages sent by bots
clean_custom_help: A more advanced cleaning command with multiple argument options
clean_between_help: Cleans all messages between the two given ones
warn_help: Warns a user (kicked on first 4 warns, banned on second 4 warns)
inf_help: Base command for infractions. View the subcommands for more info
inf_find_help: Finds all infractions either by user or server
clearwarns_help: Clears all warnings of a user
rank_help: Shows a users rank (pass in no member to view your own)
lvlrole_help: Base command for configuring role rewards. View the subcommands for more info.
ranks_help: Shows a list of all role rewards
add_help: Sets up a role reward for the given level
about_text:
🖥 I have been online for {days} days, {hours} hours, {minutes} minutes & {seconds} seconds 
💬 I received {user_messages} user messages & {bot_messages} bot messages ({own_messages} were mine) 
📬 During that time {command_count} commands & {custom_command_count} custom commands were executed 
✈️ I'm currently in {guilds} guilds 
👀 With {total_users} users ({unique_users} unique) 
📝 Version: {version}
log_mod_actions: <:greenTick:751915988143833118> I will now log any mod actions to {channel}!
no_ignored_users: There aren't any ignored users configured, all users will be logged
warn_error: <:redTick:751916874522034239> There was an error trying to warn ``{target}``: {error}
no_inf: I couldn't find any infractions here.
lvl_up: Hey {user}, you just advanced to level **{lvl}**, congrats! 🥳
role_added: Hey {user}, you just got the ``{role}`` role in the server ``{guild}`` for reaching level ``{lvl}``, congrats! 🎉
not_enough_for_lb: <:redTick:751916874522034239> There have to be at least 2 ranked people in order to display a leaderboard.
already_role_for_lvl: <:redTick:751916874522034239> A role reward for level ``{lvl}`` already exists.
already_lvl_role: <:redTick:751916874522034239> ``{role}`` is already registered as a role reward for a different level.
max_lvl_roles: <:redTick:751916874522034239> This server has reached max amount of role rewards (``10``)
added_lvl_role: <:greenTick:751915988143833118> Added ``{role}`` as a role reward for level ``{lvl}``!
no_lvl_roles: <:redTick:751916874522034239> This server doesn't have any level roles yet.
invalid_lvl_role: <:redTick:751916874522034239> Hmm, seems like ``{role}`` isn't configured as a role reward.
max_ban: Max targets to ban at once are 15
cant_ban_anyone: Seems like I can't ban any of these people.
max_kick: Max targets to kick at once are 15
cant_kick_anyone: Seems like I can't kick any of these people.
no_delete_then: 🤔 Ok, so you want me to delete no messages? Alright, I think I'm done then!
already_cleaning: <:redTick:751916874522034239> There is already a clean going on. Please wait until it's done before starting the next one.
cleaning_error: <:redTick:751916874522034239> There was an error while trying perform this action: ``{error}``
no_member_object: Weird, it seems like Discord thinks you are not in this server.
no_targets_found: <:redTick:751916874522034239> No targets found matching your given criteria
already_deleted: <:redTick:751916874522034239> Hmmm, something went wrong here. Looks like the message I tried to delete has already been deleted.
prompt_text:
{message}

React with {yes} to confirm or {no} to deny.
advanced_invalid_length_unit: Invalid length unit, Valid units: week/s, day/s, hour/s, minute/s, second/s, w, d, h, m, s
help_suffix:
Use {prefix}help <command> to get more information about a command (subcommands & args)
```
still_caching: The cached data for this guild is currently being rebuild. Try again in a few minutes.
still_getting_member_info: AutoMod is currently starting up and is still receiving the initial member info for this guild. Try again in a few minutes.
just_joined: AutoMod just joined this guild & is is still receiving the initial member info. Try again in a few seconds
missing_bot_perms: 🔒 Seems like I'm missing the required permissions to do this.
missing_arg:
<:redTick:751916874522034239> You are missing a required argument: ``{arg}`` 
🔧 Usage: ``{usage}``
arg_parse_error:
<:redTick:751916874522034239> Failed to parse the ``{arg}`` param: ``{error}`` 
🔧 Usage: ``{usage}``
on_cooldown: This command is currently on cooldown. You can use it again in ``{retry_after}`` seconds
missing_user_perms: 🔒 You are missing the required permissions to execute this command.
cant_send_message: Looks like you tried to use a command in a channel I'm not allowed to send messages in. Make sure I have the ``send messages`` permission in the channel.
msg_too_long: Sorry, but the message must not have more than 1500 chars.
channel_success: <:greenTick:751915988143833118> Successfully set the welcoming channel to {channel}!
